mapper.insert: insert into Cup_Team(TEAM_NAME, TEAM_LEADER, TEAM_PHONE, TEAM_MAIL, TEAM_UNIFORM_HOME, TEAM_UNIFORM_AWAY, TEAM_EMBLEM, TEAM_PASSWORD, TEAM_CODE, TEAM_MEMBER_CNT, TEAM_REG_YEAR, BRANCH_NO) values(#{team_name}, #{team_leader}, #{team_phone}, #{team_mail}, #{team_uniform_home}, #{team_uniform_away}, #{team_emblem}, #{team_password}, #{team_code} , #{team_member_cnt}, #{team_reg_year}, #{branch_no})
mapper.select: select * from CUP_TEAM TEAM_NO WHERE team_name = #{cupTeam_name}
mapper.insert: insert into Cup_Player(PLAYER_NAME, PLAYER_PHOTO, PLAYER_GAMES, PLAYER_GOAL, PLAYER_YELLOW_CARD, PLAYER_RED_CARD, TEAM_NO) values(#{player_name}, #{player_photo}, #{player_games}, #{player_goal}, #{player_yellow_card}, #{player_red_card}, #{team_no})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, t.* FROM Cup_Player p JOIN Cup_Team t ON p.TEAM_NO = t.TEAM_NO
SELECT t.*, b.branch_no, b.branch_name FROM Cup_Team t JOIN branch b ON t.branch_no = b.branch_no
SELECT p.*, t.* FROM Cup_Player p JOIN Cup_Team t ON p.TEAM_NO = t.TEAM_NO ORDER BY PLAYER_GOAL DESC;
SELECT p.*,t.*, b.branch_no, b.branch_name FROM Cup_Player p JOIN Cup_Team t ON p.TEAM_NO = t.TEAM_NO JOIN branch b ON b.branch_no = t.branch_no WHERE t.TEAM_NO = #{player_no}
SELECT p.*, t.* FROM Cup_Player p JOIN Cup_Team t ON p.TEAM_NO = t.TEAM_NO WHERE t.TEAM_NO = #{player_no};

SELECT s.*, d.*, h.TEAM_NO, h.TEAM_NAME AS HOME_NAME, h.TEAM_EMBLEM AS HOME_EMBLEM, a.TEAM_NO, a.TEAM_NAME AS AWAY_NAME, a.TEAM_EMBLEM AS AWAY_EMBLEM, b.branch_no, b.branch_name FROM cup_match_schedule s JOIN Cup_Team h ON h.TEAM_NO = s.TEAM_HOME_NO JOIN Cup_Team a ON a.TEAM_NO = s.TEAM_AWAY_NO JOIN CUP_MATCH_DETAIL d ON d.DETAIL_NO = s.DETAIL_NO JOIN BRANCH b ON b.branch_no = s.branch_no ORDER BY s.SCHEDULE_DATE DESC;

SELECT s.*, d.*, h.TEAM_NO, h.TEAM_NAME AS HOME_NAME, h.TEAM_EMBLEM AS HOME_EMBLEM, a.TEAM_NO, a.TEAM_NAME AS AWAY_NAME, a.TEAM_EMBLEM AS AWAY_EMBLEM FROM cup_match_schedule s JOIN Cup_Team h ON h.TEAM_NO = s.TEAM_HOME_NO JOIN Cup_Team a ON a.TEAM_NO = s.TEAM_AWAY_NO JOIN CUP_MATCH_DETAIL d ON d.DETAIL_NO = s.DETAIL_NO WHERE TEAM_HOME_NO = #{team_no} OR TEAM_AWAY_NO = #{team_no} ORDER BY s.SCHEDULE_DATE DESC;
mapper.update: update CUP_TEAM set BRANCH_NO = #{branch_no}, TEAM_NAME = #{team_name}, TEAM_LEADER = #{team_leader}, TEAM_PHONE = #{team_phone}, TEAM_MAIL = #{team_mail}, TEAM_PASSWORD = #{team_password}, TEAM_CODE = #{team_code} where TEAM_NO = #{team_no}
mapper.insert: insert into CUP_MATCH_SCHEDULE(TEAM_HOME_NO, TEAM_AWAY_NO, SCHEDULE_LOCATION, SCHEDULE_DATE, SCHEDULE_TIME, SCHEDULE_HOME_GOAL, SCHEDULE_AWAY_GOAL, BRANCH_NO, DETAIL_NO) values(#{team_home_no}, #{team_away_no}, #{schedule_location}, #{schedule_date}, #{schedule_time}, #{schedule_home_goal}, #{schedule_away_goal}, #{branch_no}, #{detail_no})

insert into cup_match_detail(DETAIL_TEAM_HOME_GOAL, DETAIL_TEAM_AWAY_GOAL, DETAIL_HOME_YELLOW_CARD, DETAIL_AWAY_YELLOW_CARD, DETAIL_HOME_RED_CARD, DETAIL_AWAY_RED_CARD) values(#{detail_home_goal}, #{detail_away_goal}, #{detail_home_yellow_card}, #{detail_away_yellow_card}, #{detail_home_red_card}, #{detail_away_red_card})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as schedule_no FROM cup_match_schedule;
mapper.update: update cup_match_detail set DETAIL_TEAM_HOME_GOAL = #{detail_home_goal}, DETAIL_TEAM_AWAY_GOAL = #{detail_away_goal}, DETAIL_HOME_YELLOW_CARD = #{detail_home_yellow_card}, DETAIL_AWAY_YELLOW_CARD = #{detail_away_yellow_card}, DETAIL_HOME_RED_CARD = #{detail_home_red_card}, DETAIL_AWAY_RED_CARD = #{detail_away_red_card} WHERE DETAIL_NO = #{detail_no}

update CUP_PLAYER set PLAYER_NAME = #{player_name}, PLAYER_GAMES = #{player_games}, PLAYER_GOAL = #{player_goal}, PLAYER_YELLOW_CARD = #{player_yellow_card}, PLAYER_RED_CARD = #{player_red_card} WHERE PLAYER_NO = #{player_no}
